page.title: 04HULL PRISON
page.content: In a cell they have a television, video,and carpets.When a prison warden searches the cells they find all sorts of of forbidden things:short wave radios,rope ladders,tattooing machines bombs,razor blades and glass melted into toothbrushes and wooden clubs. They are allowed to make things in the woodwork room and if interested in craft then they are allowed craft knives. {One of the biggest problems in the {prison is the use of drugs.Friends and {relatives pass them to the criminals {when they kiss them at visiting time. {The inmates swallow them and then {gather them the following day. {Then they smoke it. { { }BY TERESA WRAY & PAULA TRAN.
